<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>This script update account code and account path which has '^' symbol</description>
        <name>Fix carrot in account code and path</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var sysProp = new GlideRecord('sys_properties');
sysProp.addActiveQuery();
sysProp.addQuery('name','com.snc.cs_base.last.generated.code.tree.path');
sysProp.query();
var propValue;
if (sysProp.next())
	propValue = sysProp.value;

var acc = new GlideRecord("customer_account");
acc.setLimit(1);
acc.orderByDesc("number");
acc.query();
var value;
if(acc.next())
	value = acc.getValue("account_code");

if(propValue && value && propValue != value) {
	sysProp.value = value;
	sysProp.update();
}

var codeGenerator = new global.generateCodeForTreePath();
var code;
var gr =  new GlideRecord('customer_account');
gr.addQuery('account_code', 'CONTAINS', '^');
gr.query();
gs.info("Total accounts to be processed: " + gr.getRowCount());
var updated = '';
var counter = 0;
try{
	while(gr.next()){
		code = codeGenerator.generateCode();
		var currentAccountCode = gr.getValue('account_code');
		gr.account_code = code;
		if(!gr.update()) {
			throw 'Could not process account code: '+ currentAccountCode + ' for account ' +gr.getValue('name');
		}
		
		counter++;
		var accPath = new GlideRecord('customer_account');
		accPath.addQuery('account_path', 'CONTAINS', currentAccountCode);
		accPath.query();
		while(accPath.next()) {
			var accountPath = accPath.getValue('account_path');
			var newAccountPath = accountPath.replace(currentAccountCode, code);
			accPath.setValue('account_path',newAccountPath);
			accPath.update();
		}
	}}catch(err) {
		gs.error(err);
	}
	
	gs.info("Total accounts processed: " + counter);]]></script>
